pageMeta.title: Free Productivity Tools - TASKMATE | Educational & Professional Software
pageMeta.description: Discover TASKMATE's complete suite of free productivity tools. CV generators, document tools, project managers, and educational resources. No registration required.
pageMeta.keywords: free tools, productivity tools, educational software, professional tools, cv generator, document tools, project management, taskmate tools

heroSection.title: Powerful Tools for Education & Professional Growth
heroSection.subtitle: Access our complete suite of free, no-registration-required tools designed to streamline your workflow and boost productivity

featuredTools.name: Professional CV Generator
featuredTools.description: Create stunning, ATS-friendly resumes and CVs with multiple templates and themes. Export to PDF, Word, or JSON formats.

featuredTools.name: Smart Task Manager
featuredTools.description: Organize your projects and daily tasks with our intuitive task management system. Set priorities, deadlines, and track progress.

featuredTools.name: Universal Document Converter
featuredTools.description: Convert between multiple document formats instantly. Support for PDF, Word, Excel, and image formats with preserved formatting.

testimonials.name: Sarah Chen
testimonials.content: The CV Generator helped me land my first internship! The templates are professional and the process was incredibly easy.

testimonials.name: Michael Rodriguez
testimonials.content: TASKMATE's productivity tools have streamlined our team's workflow. The task manager is intuitive and powerful.

testimonials.name: Dr. Emily Watson
testimonials.content: The educational tools are perfect for my students. The citation generator alone saves hours of work each week.
